name: Gotta Move Prompt Group Prototype
description:
Directional controls: Right, Up, Down, and Left arrow keys

Jumping: Space

Dashing: z key

Toggle Movement Mode: t key

Built on top of the base Unity project from the Celeste's Movement | Mix and Jam repository. This prototype aimed at altering the movement of the player to better resemble that of the original pico8 game Celeste. These alteration come in a polished mode which seeks to better emulate the movement of Celeste while the distinct movement style features other additions like a charge jump and modified speed values.

Credits for project:

Coding - Em Coo, Gustavo Cruz, Justin Murillo

Audio and SFX - Yiye Zhu

Level Design - Vivian Zheng

Video Script - Jen To, Em Coo, Vivian Zheng

Video Essay Voiceover - Justin Murillo

Video Editing - Logan Flansaas

Presentation Slides - Jen To, Justin Murillo

Built for Jam 2 assignment for the Capstone Game Design Course (CMPM 170) at UC Santa Cruz.
